posts.post_content:
Posted By: peter
I'm looking for n-28 allan and ginter cards in poor to vg grade range. it could be raw or graded. I only want baseball players from the set. Any baseball player is fine, but the Cap Anson and Kelley are 2 cards i prefer over the others. Please email me at holysportsfan@yahoo.com if you have any cards.

Posted By: Bryan Long
Peter,
I sent you an e-mail.  I have three of them that I may sell to you if you want them.  I have found something that I would like to have and need the money of course to buy it.  I just hate selling cards I want to get something else I want, but I guess that is the way it is when you have a small budget.
You can see them on my website:
www.geocities.com/trib011

.

non-baseball? I am putting a set together and need some as well also N-29's!
